channel.title: Fight4LifeMC
channel.description: Fight4LifeMC is a Minecraft server that has been running for over 5 years and is the perfect place for playing with friends!

item.title: Fight4Life Update 6 (!)
item.dc:creator: macsorj
item.description: Hello and happy holidays everyone! The rollout of Fight4Life Update 6 has finally been completed after approximately 7 months! This is by far the most [...]
item.content:encoded:
Hello and happy holidays everyone!

The rollout of Fight4Life Update 6 has finally been completed after approximately 7 months! This is by far the most transformative update in Fight4Life history. The following are just the major changes that were made (there are too many to list!) :

General Changes to Existing Features/Content:

  • Spigot updated to 1.13.2
  • Server no longer uses old 1.8 protocol
  • Central hub removed as it is no longer needed
  • Server no longer uses Bungeecord
  • Shop has been replaced with a new, much larger shop. Prices have also been adjusted
  • Ranks now have new names and kits
  • Number of homes for each rank has been adjusted
  • Ranks are now acquired by playtime hours and not by purchase with in-game currency
  • Website has been redesigned due to performance issues on certain web browsers
  • The old combat system has been replaced

Content/Features Removed:

  • Anarchy game mode due to low player count
  • Skyblock game mode due to high server resource usage
  • Factions game mode due to high server resource usage
  • A few unnecessary plugins

Content/Features Added:

  •  New token currency for purchasing commands and other intangible items.
  •  Live dynamic map of the entire server that can be viewed at /map
  •  An elections channel on the Discord server where players can vote on issues such as features /content from suggestions, as well as issues involving rules, administration, or the punishment of
    players

Known Issues:

  • Some commands do not work correctly or at all in the command block
  • /r or /reply does not work, forcing players to type /m [player] or a similar command each time they wish to reply to a message
  •  Performance may be slower at times due to a high number of plugins. Some content/features may be removed in future Fight4Life updates.

The next Fight4Life update will begin rolling out after the release of Minecraft 1.14, which will likely be an even bigger update than 1.13, so expect a lot of new content throughout 2019

item.title: What does Minecraft 1.13 mean for Fight4Life?
item.dc:creator: macsorj
item.description: Hello everyone, so you may know that on July 18th, the Minecraft 1.13 Aquatic Update was officially released. This is the single largest update in [...]
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone, so you may know that on July 18th, the Minecraft 1.13 Aquatic Update was officially released. This is the single largest update in Minecraft history, although it may not look like it. For most of you this update probably doesn’t seem very significant because only a few updates to the gameplay and features were made. However, the reason I say this update is the biggest one yet is because of the massive backend API changes that the game has undergone. The primary focus of 1.13 for the game developers was all the technical stuff, not the new content.

So what does this mean for Fight4Life? Because of the huge changes that are happening, it will likely be many months before we can support Minecraft 1.13 and the updates that will follow. This is because the SpigotMC team and all of the plugin developers have tons of work to do when they update their stuff. I do not think we will be able to continue running the 1.8 API because of all the changes that must be made, so we might have to drop support for 1.12 and all versions that come before it when we finally move to 1.13. A few plugins that the server runs right now may have to be removed in the future.

This update will not significantly impact gameplay on Fight4lifeMC, but will seriously slow down progress towards new content and features on the server. Right now there’s not much to do except wait, because like I said before, the SpigotMC team has a lot of work ahead of them before they are able to release a stable build of Spigot. It will likely be anywhere from 2 to 9 months before we can begin the update process. If you want to learn more about the changes to Spigot and the new API, you can read this update written by md_5, a SpigotMC administrator and developer: https://goo.gl/1WX9su

One last thing: Yeah I know the server is kinda dead right now lol but i’m going to work on it soon. I’ve been really busy with life ‘n’ stuff.

item.title: Fight4Life Update 5
item.dc:creator: macsorj
item.description: Fight4Life Update 5 is here! Anarchy game mode added! New portals in spawn for future content updates The survival portal now leads to a hub [...]
item.content:encoded:
Fight4Life Update 5 is here!

  • Anarchy game mode added!
  • New portals in spawn for future content updates
  • The survival portal now leads to a hub of survival related game modes, including Anarchy
  • Combat mechanics updated
  • Updated server icon in multiplayer menu
  • Casino removed from survival as it caused players to become too wealthy:

Pictures:

item.title: Fight4Life Update 4
item.dc:creator: macsorj
item.description: Fight4Life Update 4 Has Arrived! Changes made: Fight4Life now uses the 1.8 protocol meaning you can log in using any client version from 1.8 to [...]
item.content:encoded:
Fight4Life Update 4 Has Arrived!

Changes made:

  • Fight4Life now uses the 1.8 protocol meaning you can log in using any client version from 1.8 to 1.12.2!
  • Combat mechanics in the Factions realm have been modified to make shields/blocking more useful
  • Shields can now be decorated in factions!
  • You can now dual wield items in factions!
  • A few optimizations were made in the server configurations

item.title: Fight4life Update 3
item.dc:creator: macsorj
item.description: After nearly a month of development, Fight4Life Update 3 has finally been completed! Changes made: Skyblock has been moved from Survival to its own realm [...]
item.content:encoded:
After nearly a month of development, Fight4Life Update 3 has finally been completed!

Changes made:

  • Skyblock has been moved from Survival to its own realm
  • A new spawn now serves as a hub to connect to all of the realms. The old spawn is now the spawn for the survival realm
  • The old Minecraft combat system is now in use in all realms except for Skyblock
  • The factions realm was introduced
  • Several broken plugins were removed
  • The vote sites were updated
  • Crate rewards in the factions realm were updated
  • The server has been upgraded to 24GB of RAM from 12
  • All server files were moved to solid state storage, vastly improving the loading times

item.title: Fight4Life’s 5th Year
item.dc:creator: macsorj
item.description: Today marks the 5th year since Fight4Life launched to the public! It has been a long, incredibly fun journey, and there will be many [...]
item.content:encoded:
Today marks the 5th year since Fight4Life launched to the public! It has been a long, incredibly fun journey, and there will be many more great times to come in the future! The server and the community has had a huge impact on my life. It’s impossible to see how much different everything would be for me if it hadn’t existed. I’ve met some incredible people over the years through the server, and there are so many memorable events and adventures that have happened.

I hope everyone continues to help the server grow, improve, and most importantly, for everyone to have fun!

 

Here are all of the people I would like to thank for making Fight4Life great:

IsraelCabrera

xXZachTheKingXx

Abomb2002
